How many people are affected by rapid-onset dystonia parkinsonism ?,"Rapid-onset dystonia parkinsonism appears to be a rare disorder, although its prevalence is unknown. It has been diagnosed in individuals and families from the United States, Europe, and Korea.",GHR,rapid-onset dystonia parkinsoni
